name: py-earth2mip

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Earth-2 Model Intercomparison Project (MIP). A python framework that
enables climate researchers and scientists to explore and experiment
with AI models for weather and climate.

dependencies.name: py-altair
dependencies.description: Declarative statistical visualization library for Python

dependencies.name: py-boto3
dependencies.description: The AWS SDK for Python.

dependencies.name: py-cdsapi
dependencies.description: Climate Data Store API.

dependencies.name: py-cfgrib
dependencies.description:
Python interface to map GRIB files to the NetCDF Common Data Model
following the CF Convention using ecCodes.

dependencies.name: py-cftime
dependencies.description:
Python library for decoding time units and variable values in a netCDF
file conforming to the Climate and Forecasting (CF) netCDF conventions

dependencies.name: py-dask
dependencies.description: Dask is a flexible parallel computing library for analytics.

dependencies.name: py-distributed
dependencies.description: Distributed scheduler for Dask

dependencies.name: py-eccodes
dependencies.description: Python interface to the ecCodes GRIB and BUFR decoder/encoder.

dependencies.name: py-ecmwf-opendata
dependencies.description: A package to download ECMWF open data.

dependencies.name: py-ecmwflibs
dependencies.description:
A Python package that wraps some of ECMWF libraries to be used by Python
interfaces to ECMWF software.

dependencies.name: py-einops
dependencies.description:
Flexible and powerful tensor operations for readable and reliable code.
Supports numpy, pytorch, tensorflow, and others.

dependencies.name: py-flax
dependencies.description: Flax: A neural network library for JAX designed for flexibility.

dependencies.name: py-fsspec
dependencies.description: A specification for pythonic filesystems.

dependencies.name: py-gcsfs
dependencies.description: Pythonic file-system for Google Cloud Storage.

dependencies.name: py-graphcast
dependencies.description: GraphCast: Learning skillful medium-range global weather forecasting.

dependencies.name: py-h5netcdf
dependencies.description:
A Python interface for the netCDF4 file-format that reads and writes
local or remote HDF5 files directly via h5py or h5pyd, without relying
on the Unidata netCDF library.

dependencies.name: py-h5py
dependencies.description:
The h5py package provides both a high- and low-level interface to the
HDF5 library from Python.

dependencies.name: py-importlib-metadata
dependencies.description: Read metadata from Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-jax
dependencies.description:
JAX is Autograd and XLA, brought together for high-performance machine
learning research. With its updated version of Autograd, JAX can
automatically differentiate native Python and NumPy functions. It can
differentiate through loops, branches, recursion, and closures, and it
can take derivatives of derivatives of derivatives. It supports reverse-
mode differentiation (a.k.a. backpropagation) via grad as well as
forward-mode differentiation, and the two can be composed arbitrarily to
any order.

dependencies.name: py-joblib
dependencies.description: Lightweight pipelining with Python functions.

dependencies.name: py-loguru
dependencies.description: Loguru is a library which aims to bring enjoyable logging in Python.

dependencies.name: py-netcdf4
dependencies.description: Python interface to the netCDF Library.

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.

dependencies.name: py-nvidia-modulus
dependencies.description: A deep learning framework for AI-driven multi-physics systems.

dependencies.name: py-onnxruntime
dependencies.description:
ONNX Runtime is a performance-focused complete scoring engine for Open
Neural Network Exchange (ONNX) models, with an open extensible
architecture to continually address the latest developments in AI and
Deep Learning. ONNX Runtime stays up to date with the ONNX standard with
complete implementation of all ONNX operators, and supports all ONNX
releases (1.2+) with both future and backwards compatibility.

dependencies.name: py-pandas
dependencies.description:
pandas is a fast, powerful, flexible and easy to use open source data
analysis and manipulation tool, built on top of the Python programming
language.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-properscoring
dependencies.description: Proper scoring rules in Python.

dependencies.name: py-pydantic
dependencies.description: Data validation and settings management using Python type hinting.

dependencies.name: py-pytest
dependencies.description: pytest: simple powerful testing with Python.

dependencies.name: py-pytest-asyncio
dependencies.description:
pytest-asyncio is an Apache2 licensed library, written in Python, for
testing asyncio code with pytest.

dependencies.name: py-pytest-regtest
dependencies.description: pytest plugin for snapshot regression testing.

dependencies.name: py-pytest-timeout
dependencies.description:
A plugin which will terminate tests after a certain timeout, assuming
the test session isn't being debugged.

dependencies.name: py-python-dotenv
dependencies.description:
Read key-value pairs from a .env file and set them as environment
variables

dependencies.name: py-s3fs
dependencies.description:
S3FS builds on aiobotocore to provide a convenient Python filesystem
interface for S3.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools-scm
dependencies.description: The blessed package to manage your versions by scm tags.

dependencies.name: py-torch
dependencies.description:
Tensors and Dynamic neural networks in Python with strong GPU
acceleration.

dependencies.name: py-torch-harmonics
dependencies.description: A differentiable spherical harmonic transform for PyTorch.

dependencies.name: py-tqdm
dependencies.description: A Fast, Extensible Progress Meter

dependencies.name: py-typer
dependencies.description: Typer, build great CLIs. Easy to code. Based on Python type hints.

dependencies.name: py-wheel
dependencies.description: A built-package format for Python.

dependencies.name: py-xarray
dependencies.description: N-D labeled arrays and datasets in Python

dependencies.name: py-xskillscore
dependencies.description: Metrics for verifying forecasts.

dependencies.name: py-zarr
dependencies.description:
Zarr is a Python package providing an implementation of chunked,
compressed, N-dimensional arrays.
